text: building and maintaining your own email
service is expensive and timec consuming
first you have to buy dedicated hardware
and software and then you need to hire
staff to get it all running in addition
to large upfront costs you also have to
deal with regular maintenance including
installation of security patches
software updates software upgrades not
to mention all the availability planning
you'll need to do around snapshots
backups and Disaster Recovery hosting
services are an option but can introduce
other challenges including control over
where the data is located encryption and
Key Management of sensitive data
compatibility with popular m clients and
support for mobile devices wouldn't it
be great to offer users the solution
they need to be productive while
addressing your cost and security
concerns introducing Amazon workmail
Amazon workmail is a secure cloud-based
email and calendar solution for desktops
and mobile devices getting started with
Amazon workmail is easy requires no up
front investment and feature simple pay
as youo pricing with a small monthly fee
for each Amazon workmail mailbox you
launch unlike other cloud-based email
providers Amazon workmail was designed
to deliver the security and control your
data requires with Amazon workmail you
have Geographic control by managing the
AWS regions that store your data and
also have control over security with
unique encryption keys that are
generated and maintained with the AWS
Key Management Service Amazon workmail
also integrates with your corporate
active directory environment making it
easy for you to manage your existing
users in groups and allowing those users
to access their mailbox using their
existing corporate
credentials Amazon workmail offers users
several options to make it easy for them
to access their mail and calendar from
multiple devices in addition to
integration with popular client software
including Microsoft Outlook Amazon
workmail also provides a rich web client
experience ensuring users will always
have access to their mailin calendar
from any internet connected
device Amazon workmail can help you and
your users get the most out of your
email and calendar environment by making
sure it is stored securely available
when needed and can scale as your needs
grow to learn more about Amazon workmail
visit our website and sign up for the
free trial
today
